TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider

summary.span: 實作事件提供者，將事件告知儲存至 SQL 資料庫。

span.span: Implements an event provider that saves event notifications to an SQL database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件類型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 這個提供者具有一組完整的組態屬性，您可以用來自訂其行為。This provider has a comprehensive set of configuration attributes that you can use to customize its behavior. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統``組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需建立自訂提供者的範例，請參閱[How to： 實作健全狀況監視自訂提供者範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何指定的型別提供者的組態檔摘錄中``> 一節。The following example is a configuration file excerpt that shows how to specify a provider of type in the `` section. ``中的項目``區段可讓您指定的提供者會處理稽核事件。The `` element in the `` section specifies that the provider will handle audit events. ``` ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來建立的執行個體類別。You will never use it to create an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void EventProcessingComplete (System.Web.Management.WebBaseEventCollection raisedEvents);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EventProcessingComplete(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEventCollection raisedEvents) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub EventProcessingComplete (raisedEvents As WebBaseEventCollection)
protected: virtual void EventProcessingComplete(System::Web::Management::WebBaseEventCollection ^ raisedEvents);

summary.span: 當事件處理完成時呼叫。

span.span: Called when event processing is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不能從程式碼直接使用。This method is not intended to be used directly from your code. ASP.NET 健康監視系統會呼叫它。It is called by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: override void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);

param.name: name
param.span: 在組態檔中用來識別這個提供者的名稱。

span.span: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 物件，指定組態檔中指派給這個提供者的屬性。

span.span: A object that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.

summary.span: 設定這個物件的初始值。

span.span: Sets the initial values for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 呼叫方法來初始化類別使用的組態設定和組態檔中所述的名稱。ASP.NET calls the method to initialize the class with the configuration settings and name as specified in the configuration file.

span.span: There is no connection string declared in .

exception.span: 中宣告了多個連接字串。

exception.span: 提供的連接字串指定整合式安全性。

span.span: The connection string supplied by specifies Integrated Security.

exception.span: 提供的 屬性值小於 或大於 。

span.span: The value of the attribute supplied by is less than or greater than .

Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)
public: override void ProcessEvent(System::Web::Management::WebBaseEvent ^ eventRaised);

summary.span: 處理傳遞給提供者的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不能從程式碼直接使用。This method is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 健康監視系統來開始事件的處理。It is called by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system to start the processing of the event.

param.name: flushInfo
param.span: 物件，包含要清除的緩動區資訊。

span.span: The object that contains the buffer information to be flushed.

summary.span: 從提供者的緩衝區中移除所有事件。

span.span: Removes all events from the provider's buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不能從程式碼直接使用。This method is not intended to be used directly from your code. ASP.NET 健康監視系統會呼叫它。It is called by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Shutdown ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Shutdown ()
public: override void Shutdown();

summary.span: 執行與關閉提供者關聯的工作。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 呼叫應用程式定義域中裝載 Web 應用程式終止時的方法。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain that hosts the Web application terminates. 方法會呼叫執行允許應用程式正常結束的工作 」。The method is called to perform tasks that allow the application to end gracefully."
